EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up on Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "Sir or Madam")},
I wanted to follow up quickly on my last email and see if I could help answer any questions regarding Tricentis or our testing solution, Tosca Testsuite.
Please do let me know, I am happy to help! Is there a specific time that is most convenient to chat on the phone?
Thanks {!Contact.FirstName}, I look forward to hearing from you!
Best Regards,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title}
Tricentis o - {!User.Phone}, m - {!User.MobilePhone} e – {!User.Email}
Tricentis GmbH Company Headquarters: Saturn Tower, Leonard-Bernstein-Straße 10, 1220 Vienna FN 213896d Handelsgericht Wien
Tricentis US Headquarters, 5150 El Camino Real, Suite D14, Los Altos, CA 94022
